examples.example: 我今天买了一些扁豆，准备做一顿美味又健康的晚餐。

translate.english: I bought some lentils today and am going to make a delicious and healthy dinner.

examples.example: 奶奶在院子里种了许多扁豆，它们长得十分茂盛。

translate.english: Grandma planted a lot of lentils in the yard, and they grow very lushly.

examples.example: 妈妈用扁豆和其他食材做了一锅香喷喷的汤，大家都很喜欢。

translate.english: Mother made a pot of fragrant soup with lentils and other ingredients, and everyone liked it very much.
